name: TP-Link TL-WN781ND 802.11a/b/g/n PCIe x1 Wi-Fi Adapter
Features: [Adopts Align technology, Supports QSS function, complying with WPS for worry free wireless security, Supports 64/128/152-bit WEP, WPA /WPA2/WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK(TKIP/AES), supports IEEE 802.1X, Supports roaming technology, guaranteeing uninterrupted wireless connection, Supports Ad-Hoc/Infrastructure modes]
